name: Elf Rush
description:
<-Merry Christmas and a happy New Year!->

                  Welcome to Elf Rush v1.04!

                              ---Controls---

                use mouse to control character

                     click to navigate menu

            click music note icon to turn off music

                           ----Information----

you have three hearts they will disappear when you hit an obstacle.

the counter in the left corner tells how many coins you have collected this round.

every thirty coins collected you will receive a power up box when broken you will get a random power.

there are three soundtracks

-Rocking Around The Christmas Tree

-Santa Claus Is Coming To Town

-Your A Mean One Mr. Grinch

click the difficulty button to change how to hard the game is...

--Known Bugs--

(Currently Empty)

comment bugs in comments

--Fixed Bugs--

fixed multiple layering issues

fixed clone issues

fixed music problem
